name: Offline Explorer Data File
summary: Learn about .WD3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Users don't manually save and load WD3 files. Instead, users interact with a site profile and Offline Explorer automatically creates and saves WD3 files in the background. The default download directory for websites is C:\​download\​.
NOTE: Offline Explorer creates WD3 files with the filename Descr.WD3.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
